Package com.opera.core.systems.scope.internal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CallbackWait
    A variation of Selenium's Wait that uses Callable and that may have its timeout and polling interval configured on the fly.
    ImplicitWait
    Generalizes HtmlUnitDriver's wait code, inspired by WebDriverWait, but does not aim to provide a public support class.
    OperaDefaults  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OperaColors
    Enumerator for contains colour API (RGB values for standard web colours).
    OperaIntervals
    Enumerator for delay values in milliseconds.
    OperaKeys
    Maps OperaKeys to WebDriver keys
    OperaMouseKeys
    Enumerator for native mouse key events
